name: Forest Dash (captain_carrot)
description:
It's hard being a treasure hunter. Just when you think you've secured the payday of a lifetime suddenly some kind of wall of death springs up out of nowhere to consume you!

Run to the right as fast as you can while dodging traps, enemies, and terrain while trying desperately to escape with your prize. Beware though, there have been rumors of a "curse" surrounding the gem you hold, and it may make your escape more... interesting...

Originally created in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 game jam. Thanks for playing!
